description: A storytelling machine that automatically generates synthetic images as you write new words and sentences. Made with RunwayML
title: Generative Engine | RunwayML Experiments
keywords: runway, learn, machine learning, guides, generative, engine, text to image, t2i
introduction: A storytelling machine that automatically generates synthetic images as you write new words and sentences.
features: Allows users to write new words and sentences
Uses AttnGAN model for image generation

faqs.question: What is the model used for image generation?
faqs.answer: AttnGAN model is used for image generation.

faqs.question: Is there a cost for using this service?
faqs.answer: No, the service is free to use.

targetPeople: Creative writers, artists, and anyone interested in generating synthetic images
